```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://www.foxsports.com.au/nrl/nrl-premiership/stats/teams"
objs <- read_html(url)%>%
html_nodes("table")%>%
html_table()


write_csv(x = objs[[8]], file = "rugby.csv")
nrl <- read_csv("rugby.csv")
```

# 2023 STANDINGS THUS FAR 

```{r}
nrl <- nrl%>%
  mutate(`FG%` = parse_number(`FG%`))
nrl1<-
  nrl%>%
  select(-1)
cor(nrl1)

# PTS correlations: T, RM, LB, GLS, GA, 1PH, TA, 
```

```{r}
mod1 <- lm(PTS ~ RM, data = nrl)
summary(mod1)
```

```{r}
mod2 <- lm(PTS ~ LB, data = nrl)
summary(mod2)
```

```{r}
mod3 <- lm(PTS ~ GLS, data = nrl)
summary(mod3)
```

```{r}
mod4 <- lm(PTS ~ GA, data = nrl)
summary(mod4)
```

```{r}
mod5 <- lm(PTS ~ `1PH`, data = nrl)
summary(mod5)
```

```{r}
mod6 <- lm(PTS ~ TA, data = nrl)
summary(mod6)
```
